Name: interstitial nephritis
Definition: An eye disease where one or both eyeballs are abnormally small.

Name: obsolete optic atrophy associated with retinal dystrophy
Definition: An eye disease where one or both eyeballs are abnormally small.
Synonym: optic atrophy associated with retinal dystrophy (disorder)

Name: glomerulonephritis
Definition: A nephritis that causes inflammation of the glomeruli located_in kidney.
